member.name: T:WindowsFormsApplication1.AddAvailabilityWindow
member.summary: Form allowing users to flag their available time slots for an event.

member.summary: SelectedIndexChanged behavior for the event combo box. Changes displayed event info.

members.member:
AddTaskBox This Method taks in a given task as a string, and creates a new chekbox affiliated with that task Users Can then choose to sign up for a given task once it is generated on the flowLayoutPanel taskPanel
This is the string affiliated with the task itself. Onselection of a task, the event attendee's name will be added in item 1.

member.name: M:WindowsFormsApplication1.AddAvailabilityWindow.CheckUnavailableTimes(System.Int32,System.DateTime,WindowsFormsApplication1.Event)
member.summary: Add Unavailable Times To List So They Can't Be Selected
member.param: The number of 30 minute intervals in the relevant time window.
The starting DateTime of the relevant time window.
The event selected for availability modification.

member.summary: Adds checkboxes for users to select their available times.

member.summary: CheckedChanged behavior for the checkboxes. Prevent the host from delisting himself from all time slots
